title: Hold On
lyrics:
You and me, You and me
Hearts collide in heaven (in heaven)
Only hope, Only hope
we make love a weapon (a weapon)

Everybody say no no no

we gotta like feelings go

just stars will always glow



Everybody say you won't stay

But I know its gonna be okay

Our dreams will fade away



We gotta hold on hold on

It us forever us forever

We gotta hold on hold on

just us together us together



(us forever us us us forever

us forever us us us forever)



Make me strong Make me strong

If you're that feet taller, feet taller



Wanna love wanna love

Heavens run in the corner (in the corner)



Everybody say no no no

We gotta like feelings go

Just stars will always glow



Everybody say you won't stay

But I know its gonna be okay

Our dreams will fade away



We gotta hold on hold on it us forever us forever

We gotta hold on hold on just us together us together



Why do we feel like everybody pulls us down

well goes around we know the rhythm like a round



Gotta hold on hold on just us together us together



us forever us us us forever

Hold on; it us forever us us us forever



Why do we feel like everybody pulls us down

us forever us us us forever



We gotta hold on hold on just us together us us us together



We gotta hold on hold on just us together us together
